content.text: The Economic Times website features an interesting interview with DailyObjects CEO Pankaj Garg.
Economic Times’ magazine section, Panache, spotlights some great gift ideas for Father’s Day,including a cool DailyObjects designer case.
The Indian Express covers our tie-up with Anurag Kashyap’s Bombay Velvet, for an exclusive collection of cases.
IBNLive talks with DailyObects CEO Pankaj Garg about the gamble we took in releasing iPhone6 cases before the phone even launched. We won!
Stuff Magazine also has Comic-fans covered, pointing them at DailyObjects' unbelievably cool Comic Collection.
Someone at Mid-Day loves our hilarious Bollywood cases!
More love from Mid-Day; this time for DailyObjects customisable cases.
IBN7 does a piece about DailyObjects exclusive Bombay Velvet film themed cases.
India’s leading media brand, IndiaToday features the DailyObjects Automobile Collection, on their site.
Hindustan Times’ magazine section does a special on Mother’s Day gift ideas,featuring a customisable smartphone case from DailyObjects.com.
The Hindu Metro Plus Melange section shows off a DailyObjects Bleed Blue case during the Cricket World Cup.
The Statesman does a short piece highlighting the fact that DailyObjects is first-to-market with cases for the Samsung Galaxy S6.
What is the Statesman’s top tip for Mother’s Day Gifts? Custom cases from DailyObjects.com
India’s premier business magazine, Business India, does a short piece about us.
The Zee News website covers DailyObjects’ tie-up with Anurag Kashyap’s film Bombay Velvet, for a line of exclusive smartphone cases.
DailyObjects CEO Pankaj Garg goes one-on-one with industry magazine SME Times, for an in-depth look into the Indian eCommerce scene.
Yourstory.com does a feature about our founders Pankaj & Saurav and talks about DailyObjects in our early days.
Techcircle.in features an article covering the launch of DailyObjects customisable cases and or future plans.
PC-Tablet talks about the eagerly anticipated Samsung Galaxy S6 and how DailyObjects has thousands of cases available for it, even before the smartphone is launched in India.
Focusnews.com covers the launch of DailyObjects’ exclusive Bombay Velvet Collection.
